cobblemonextendedbattleui.config.title: Cobblemon Extended Battle UI Settings
cobblemonextendedbattleui.config.enableT: Show Pokeball team indicators under health bars during battle
cobblemonextendedbattleui.config.enableB: Show panel with weather, terrain, field conditions, and stat stages
Show custom battle log widget with damage percentages
cobblemonextendedbattleui.config.enableM: Show tooltips with type effectiveness when hovering over moves. Disable if using Cobblemon Move Inspector.
